FdoFeatureAccessManager Class Reference

#include <FeatureAccessManager.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

The FeatureAccessManager class manages a registry of feature providers stored in the registry and provides support for dynamic discovery and binding to registered feature providers.

Definition at line 40 of file FeatureAccessManager.h.
